original_title: DI MYAY MHER THA YE KANA PHIT KAE TAL
overview: Based on actual events, this human tragedy follows a 12-year-old child soldier, Su Su Myat, and her mute brother, Tin Min, who are imprisoned after deserting their first combat mission. Punished with no food or water, Su Su Myat is forced to choose between killing her seriously ill brother for her own survival, or risk dying with him.
title: In This Land We're Briefly Ghosts
